key.name: refresh-interval
key.summary: Number of seconds between refresh (default to 5min)

key.name: refresh-menuitem
key.summary: Whether to display or not a menu item to refresh manually.

key.name: symbolic-icons
key.summary: When true use symbolic (black/white) versions of icons.

key.name: settings-menuitem
key.summary: Whether to add a settings menu item or not.

key.name: hidden-devices
key.summary: List of device identifier to hide from the indicator (still showed in the menu)
key.description: Devices listed here won't display in the panel indicator unless they are the only device to show.
